授業目的: 本授業の目的は、受講者が中級程度の内容のフランス語を聞き、話す力を身につけ，自立した言語使用者となることである。
到達目標: 本授業では、受講者が、フランス語の複雑な会話やニュースや講演の概要を聞き取り、それについて話すことができることを到達目標とする。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: The course will be based on a textbook, whose lessons and exercises are dealing with 4 essential skills: communication, grammar, vocabulary, cultural insights. The content of the book is focused on daily life matters and current issues like the environment, the education, gender relations, intergenerational relationships...

トピック.授業計画1: The textbook is divided in 12 units, each of it consisting of various documents (written, pictorial, audio-recordings, audiovisual material), coming with explanations of grammatical points, lists of vocabulary on specific themes, and a range of exercises of oral and written practice. In the Spring semester, we shall cover units 1 ~ 3 or 4: each unit will be covered in 3 or 4 weeks, followed by a short examination (through a written homework, possibly combined with an oral exercise in interaction). At the end of the semester, a longer test will be given, in-class, including exercises of written and oral understanding.
トピック.授業外学習2: There shall be a little homework to do every week: reading short texts and answering of couple of questions about them; preparing exercises about grammar and vocabulary, in the prospect to be questioned by the professor in class; reflecting on a topic related to the lesson, in the prospect of a debate to be conducted in class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Final test, given the last day of class
成績評価Grading3: Active participation in class, oral exercises in interaction
